title: Worlds 2017 Icon
body: Currently whenever you buy a team icon it will show in game chat that you are supporting said team, but when you buy the worlds icon it says nothing at all, it would be nice if a message appeared when using the worlds icon that said something along the lines of "-name- is supporting the 2017 World Championship" since both bundles cost the same it feels like the users who buy the worlds icon aren't getting as much as those who buy the team icon.
